items.sentence: Tom was ashamed to tell anybody what he did.
Tom was asleep on the couch, snoring loudly.
It\'s clear that you didn\'t speak with Tom.
Do you think Tom would\'ve done it that way?
Please don\'t play near the railroad tracks.
Please let me know as soon as it\'s decided.
Tom had better hurry or he\'ll miss the bus.
Tom hadn\'t had anything to eat since lunch.
Tom tried to forget about what had happened.
Tom tried to kiss Mary, but she leaned back.
Tom tried to pick up his keys with his toes.
Tom tried to warn Mary, but she ignored him.
You might meet Tom if you go to the library.
You might want to reconsider that move, Tom.
You need to learn to mind your own business.
Didn\'t you know Tom used to work in Boston?
Do you have a room that\'s a little cheaper?
How long has it been since you\'ve seen Tom?
Tom gets along fine with Mary\'s stepfather.
Tom had a bottle of poison in his briefcase.
